metadata.title: CVE-2024-2616 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memoryconditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
